channel.title: Connection problem
channel.description: I have been running a server for a couple of weeks now, it is running on a media computer stored downstairs, i use remote desktop connection to edit my files and everything. suddenly, i cannot connect to my own server. my client screen is white and then in the client cmd box it comes up with error_game_connect5 i'm pretty sure that other people can connect, google says it's online. please help, Brendon --------------------------EDIT------------------------------ i left it for a while, and it connected, but why is it taking so long? and i think its java, is that possible? that my java is running slow? and i finaly connected to my server it took about 3 minutes,and no1 was on? maybe its my computer?

thumbs up lol

item.title: Connection problem
item.dc:creator: @red_arrow red arrow
item.description:
@red_arrow wrote:

I have been running a server for a couple of weeks now,
it is running on a media computer stored downstairs,
i use remote desktop connection to edit my files and everything. suddenly, i cannot connect to my own server.
my client screen is white and then in the client cmd box it comes up with error_game_connect5
i’m pretty sure that other people can connect, google says it’s online.
please help,
Brendon
--------------------------EDIT------------------------------
i left it for a while, and it connected, but why is it taking so long?
and i think its java, is that possible?
that my java is running slow?
and i finaly connected to my server it took about 3 minutes,and no1 was on? maybe its my computer?

Read full topic
